verses.verse: The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G1905>desired<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that he would <S%G1925>shew<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, When it is <S%G1096><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> , ye say <S%G3004><s%> , It will be fair weather <S%G2105><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%> , It will be foul weather <S%G5494><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> and lowring <S%G4768><s%> . O ye hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> , ye can <S%G1097><s%> discern <S%G1252%G3303><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> can ye <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> discern the signs <S%G4592><s%> of the times <S%G2540><s%> ?

A wicked <S%G4190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeketh after <S%G1934><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> unto it <S%G846><s%> , but <S%G1508><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jonas <S%G2495><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G565>departed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%>, they had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Take heed <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, It is <S%G3754>because<s%> we have <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

Which <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, O ye of little faith <S%G3640><s%> , why <S%G5101><s%> reason ye <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> ye have brought <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> ?

Do ye <S%G3539><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> , neither <S%G3761><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the five thousand <S%G4000><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> ye took up <S%G2983><s%> ?
Neither <S%G3761><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the four thousand <S%G5070><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> ye took up <S%G2983><s%> ?

How <S%G4459><s%> is it that <S%G3754><s%> ye do <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> that I spake <S%G2036><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> , that ye should beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> ?

<S%G5119>Then<s%> understood <S%G4920>they<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2036>bade<s%> them <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>coasts<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi<s%>, he <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> do men <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> am <S%G1511><s%> ?

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, Some say that thou <S%G3303>art<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910%G1161>Baptist<s%>: <S%G243>some<s%>, <S%G2243>Elias<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%>, <S%G2408>Jeremias<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>.
He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, But <S%G1161><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> that I <S%G3165><s%> am <S%G1511><s%> ?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> art thou <S%G1488><s%> , Simon <S%G4613><s%> Bar-jona <S%G920><s%> : for <S%G3754><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> hath <S%G601><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> it unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the gates <S%G4439><s%> of hell <S%G86><s%> shall <S%G2729><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> prevail against <S%G2729><s%> it <S%G846><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> thou shalt bind <S%G1210><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> thou shalt loose <S%G3089><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> loosed <S%G3089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

<S%G5119>Then<s%> charged <S%G1291>he<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

¶ <S%G575>From<s%> that time <S%G5119>forth<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G1166>shew<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be raised <S%G1453>again<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Be it <S%G2436>far<s%> from <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G4762>turned<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, Get thee <S%G5217><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> , Satan <S%G4567><s%> : thou <S%G1488><s%> art <S%G3754><s%> an offence <S%G4625><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%> : for thou savourest <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that be of God <S%G2316><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> those that be of men <S%G444><s%> .

¶ <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, If any <S%G1536><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> , let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it <S%G846><s%> : and <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G302><s%> will lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G1752><s%> my <S%G1700><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> profited <S%G5623><s%> , if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> , and <S%G1161><s%> lose <S%G2210><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> ? or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his <S%G846><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> ?

For <S%G1063><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he shall reward <S%G591><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G4234><s%> .

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , There be <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> shall <S%G1089><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> , till <S%G302%G2193><s%> they see <S%G1492><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> .
